quotes.quote: When all is said and done, the weather and love are the two elements about which one can never be sure.
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: Barometer, n.: An ingenious instrument which indicates what kind of weather we are having.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Time for the weather report. It's cold out folks. Bonecrushing cold. The kind of cold which will wrench the spirit out of a young man, or forge it into steel.
quotes.author: Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

quotes.quote: Weather forecast for tonight: dark. Continued dark overnight, with widely scattered light by morning.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Isn't it interesting that the same people who laugh at science fiction listen to weather forecasts and economists?
quotes.author: Kelvin Throop III

quotes.quote: Don't knock the weather. If it didn't change once in a while, nine out of ten people couldn't start a conversation.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: No matter how rich you become, how famous or powerful, when you die the size of your funeral will still pretty much depend on the weather.
quotes.author: Michael Pritchard

quotes.quote: Money is the opposite of the weather. Nobody talks about it, but everybody does something about it.
quotes.author: Rebecca Johnson
